text: we'll just bring you these pictures from
Serbia where the power is out due to the
very very cold weather the Energy
Minister went to see for himself how
efforts were going to restore it and as
you can see he found out just how
dangerous it can be when he was struck
by a large icicle mr. ant is fine and
went on to say that this was the best
possible way to illustrate under which
conditions people are working very brave
